JSONCrypt.AESCrypto

Class AESKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • JSONCrypt.AESCrypto.AESKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AESKey
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Object of AES Key. Required for 128 bit AES encryption. 
     You are required to acquire an instance of this class, in order to create a 128 bit key of AES encryption.
    Since:
    27/06/17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sudipta Saha
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      This function creates AES key from binary string input.
      static AESKey hexToKey(java.lang.String key)
      This function creates AES key from hexadecimal string input.
      static AESKey randomToKey()
      This function generates a random 128 bit AES key.
      static AESKey stringToKey(java.lang.String key)

    • Method Detail

      • binaryToKey

        public static AESKey binaryToKey(java.lang.String key)
                          throws InvalidFormatException
        This function creates AES key from binary string input.
        Parameters:
        key - Binary string of 128 binary bits.
        Returns:
        object of AESKey, which will be required for AES Encryption.
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - If the input string is not 128 bits in length or is not of valid binary format.

      • hexToKey

        public static AESKey hexToKey(java.lang.String key)
                       throws InvalidFormatException
        This function creates AES key from hexadecimal string input. 
         Hexadecimal encoding :
 00 - 00
 01 - 01
 02 - 02
 03 - 03
 04 - 04 
 05 - 05
 06 - 06
 07 - 07
 08 - 08
 09 - 09
 10 -  A
 11 -  B
 12 -  C
 13 -  D
 14 -  E
 15 -  F
        Parameters:
        key - Hexadecimal string of 32 set of 4 bits.
        Returns:
        object of AESKey, which will be required for AES Encryption.
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - If the input string is not 32 characters in length or is not of valid hexadecimal format.

      • stringToKey

        public static AESKey stringToKey(java.lang.String key)
                          throws InvalidFormatException
        This function creates AES key from default java UTF-8 string input.
        Parameters:
        key - string of 16 characters.
        Returns:
        object of AESKey, which will be required for AES Encryption.
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - If the input string is not 16 characters in length or is not of valid format.

      • alphanumericToKey

        public static AESKey alphanumericToKey(java.lang.String key)
                                throws InvalidFormatException
        This function creates AES key from alpha numeric string input.
        Parameters:
        key - string of 16 characters, containing either alphabets or digits or both.
        Returns:
        object of AESKey, which will be required for AES Encryption.
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatException - InvalidFormatException If the input string is not 16 characters in length or is not of valid alphanumeric format.

      • randomToKey

        public static AESKey randomToKey()
        This function generates a random 128 bit AES key.
        Returns:
        object of AESKey, which will be required for AES Encryption.
